links.description: Contains the changes of a single commit
links.title: Single commit

___column.description: The column of the error in the input data

___line.description: The line of the error in the input data

items.description: A path segment pointing to the error in the input data

links.description: Contains the changes of a commit range
links.title: Commit range

deletedFile.description: True if the file was deleted

newFile.description: True if the file was added

diff.example:
--- /dev/null
+++ b/texts/ontohub_changed.txt
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+The main Ontohub service that serves the data for the frontend and other clients via the GraphQL API.

newMode.description: The file mode in the new state

renamedFile.description: True if the file was renamed

newPath.description: The new path of the file

oldMode.description: The file mode in the old state
